abstract: The Galleon Group, whose founder is one of six people accused in a wide-ranging insider trading scheme, said in a letter to employees and investors Wednesday that it would begin winding down its hedge funds as it faces investor redemptions. Read the letter on DealBook.
snippet: The Galleon Group, whose founder is one of six people accused in a wide-ranging insider trading scheme, said in a letter to employees and investors Wednesday that it would begin winding down its hedge funds as it faces investor redemptions. Read t...
lead_paragraph: Update | 12:03 p.m. The Galleon Group, one of the largest hedge fund investors in technology companies, plans to close its doors after its founder became embroiled in one of the widest-ranging insider trading scandals in recent memory.

headline.main: Galleon to Begin Winding Down Funds

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Zachery Kouwe

abstract: My iPhone displays an E icon for the Edge network when it cannot get a 3G signal from AT&T. But sometimes, instead of the Edge icon, I see a hollow blue dot. What does that mean?
snippet: My iPhone displays an E icon for the Edge network when it cannot get a 3G signal from AT&T. But sometimes, instead of the Edge icon, I see a hollow blue dot. What does that mean?
lead_paragraph: Q. My iPhone displays an E icon for the Edge network when it cannot get a 3G signal from AT&T. But sometimes, instead of the Edge icon, I see a hollow blue dot. What does that mean?
